properties.title: ARKATLAS
properties.description: Quantitative multi-scale (temporal and spatial) understanding of sea ice, ocean and atmosphere interactive processes and their mutual feedback, focusing on four Arctic Scientific research Challenges: Arctic Amplification, open water on sea ice dynamics, impact of extreme event storms in sea-ice formation, Artcic ocean spin-up
properties.osc:name: ARKTALAS HOAVVA PROJECT
osc:consortium: Nansen Environmental and Remote Sensing Center Norway
